thread.title: Daily Deals: God of War 3 Remastered, Jurassic World, $332 PS4
thread.title_full: Daily Deals: God of War 3 Remastered, Jurassic World, $332 PS4

author: Alex Roth
title: Daily Deals: God of War 3 Remastered, Jurassic World, $332 PS4
text:
32-inch 1080p HDTV With $100 Dell eGift Card 
Dell is selling this 32-inch Samsung TV for the same price as Amazon , but throwing in enough credit to grab a couple games. Add it your cart to see the credit. This is not a massive TV by any means, but a great deal if you need a spare for the bedroom. 

Get this big TV with a big gift card. 

Bottom Dollar Price For This 27-inch 1080p Monitor With 1ms Response Time 
This 27-inch Benq is the MLG's official gaming monitor. It has the ultra low response time you want for FPS gaming and a max resolution of 1920 x 1080 (it also has two HDMI ports, which is super convenient. If your rig can handle resolutions above that, skip this screen, but if 1080p is your machine's comfort zone, this monitor is currently $250 and has never sold for any less on Amazon - it's normally $278. 
Two Pairs of Windshield Wiper Blades For $23 
If your windshield wipers aren't cutting it, or even if they are, now is a great time to bank a couple of replacements. Amazon will walk you through picking the right size for your car, then just add two pairs to your cart and proceed to checkout to see the discount. PlayStation
